name: T.H.O.R.
description: basic effect: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.with chain reaction: Deal 1 damage to a second target thatyour first target can see.with high voltage: Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see. You cannot use this effect unless you first use the chain reaction.Notes: This card constrains the order in which you can use its effects. (Most cards don't.) Also note that each target must be a different player.
